title: ADDIE Model-Based Instructional Design for Developing a Mobile App for Infant and Toddler Care Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational app development knowledge, user-centered design comprehension, and basic infant/toddler development theory
context.additional_context: Conducted in a blended learning environment utilizing digital devices and online learning platforms. Learners integrate theory and practice through real-world app development projects.

learning_goals: Learners can design prototypes for infant and toddler care education apps by applying the five phases (Analysis-Design-Development-Implementation-Evaluation) of the ADDIE model
Learners can establish an educational content development system reflecting scientific evidence and expert consulting
Learners enhance their ability to design mobile app interfaces considering user experience (UX) and accessibility principles

resources: Mobile App Development Tools (Figma, Android Studio, etc.)
Academic Resources on Infant and Toddler Development

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
